contents.text: Hello and thank you for calling Quid, the San Francisco-based platform that connects you to the world’s information at your fingertips.
To learn about our analytics and mapping solutions, press 1.
For a live product demonstration, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our demonstration team.

navigationGoals: Schedule a product demonstration for your analytics and mapping platform
I’d like a live demo of your analytics and mapping tools to see how they could support my veteran outreach program.
I want a live walkthrough of your geospatial analytics dashboard
I’d like a live demonstration of your analytics and mapping platform.
I’d like a live demo of Quid’s analytics and mapping tools to explore research trend visualization.

contents.text: To speak with a sales representative, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to a sales specialist.

navigationGoals: Connect me with sales to go over pricing and subscription options
I want to talk to sales about subscription pricing for our veteran support nonprofit.
I need pricing details and licensing tiers for your mapping API
I want to speak with a sales representative about purchasing your analytics solution.
I need to discuss pricing and academic licensing options for Quid’s mapping solution.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, press 2.
For account and billing inquiries, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Review my account billing details and charges
I have a question about a charge on my billing invoice for our veteran services account.
I want to clarify the overage fees on my latest usage invoice
I need help understanding my account charges and billing statement.
I need to update my billing information and request an invoice for my student account.

contents.text: For technical assistance and system issues, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a technical issue I'm experiencing with the platform
I’m experiencing login errors and need technical support for my account.
I need help debugging API authentication failures in my integration
I’m having trouble with system errors and need technical support.
I’m encountering an error when uploading my research data to the platform and need technical assistance.
